What?  Wich site does nhentaj takes doujins from?

@Ziggystardust the problem is that this site directly takes this from another site. So if ppl haven't tagged properly or haven't had enough time to tag or there are wrong tags on that site then it will just be uploaded here with what it has. This site on the other hand from my experience never tags anything and the only way to get the correct tags is to reupload the hentai on that site again with the correct tags so that this site again rips it.

Hi everyone I was the one that translated this! This is my first translation, so It's not the best quality with some lines being inaccurate, but i hope it conveys the story well! I don't do commissions yet but may some day in the future after I have more experience with editing and japanese itself.

My next work will probably be another one of Jirou-sensei's works that have unfortunately been left uncompiled with other works. See you all soon (●w●)/ - PokeDiePie
